definition[0]: a person or team that is winning in a competition, and that others have to try to defeat
example[0]: That left him three strokes behind the pacesetter, Parry.
definition[1]: a person or company that is considered to be a leader in a particular area of activity
example[1]: a new company, now seen as the industryâ€™s pacesetter
definition[3]: a company that is more successful than its competitors because it develops new products, methods etc before they do
example[2]: the pacesetter for the airline industry
